Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
LightedEntity, LightSource, MovingEntity, PickUp
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
represents a basic entity that can exist in the world. Offers all basic functionality needed for ann entity
